snippet: Russian border guards detained two activists from the environmentalist group Wednesday morning after they boarded an oil rig to protest drilling in the Arctic.
abstract: Russian border guards detain two activists from environmentalist group Greenpeace after they boarded an oil rig to protest drilling in the Arctic by a state gas company.
lead_paragraph: Russian border guards detained two activists from the environmentalist group Wednesday morning after they boarded an oil rig to protest drilling in the Arctic.

headline.main: Russia: Greenpeace Members Held at Arctic Oil Rig
headline.print_headline: Russia: Greenpeace Members Held at Arctic Oil Rig
